email.title: Weekly Digest

image.title: We're in the midpoint between NYE and Tau Day already!

email.text:
Hi everyone, hope you're well!
There's an exciting week ahead of us: * the second batch of IC Hello World tickets is releasing tomorrow at 1pm * Union Elections voting opens tomorrow at 9am
Good luck to everyone starting exams next week!
email.heading: IC Hello World!
email.text:
### Want to get a chance to participate in our introductory hackathon IC Hello World?
The second batch of tickets will go live at our Eventbrite on Monday 1pm GMT!
➡️ [**Get tickets here!**](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ic-hello-world-tickets-143461698803?utm-medium=discovery&utm-campaign=social&utm-content=attendeeshare&aff=escb&utm-source=cp&utm-term=listing)
This is a great chance for you to join your first hackathon (virtually), we welcome everyone of any background from Imperial!
More details at www.ichelloworld.org
email.heading: Leadership Elections 2021
email.text:
Leadership Elections Voting opens at 9:00 on Monday, 15 March.
You can find all manifestos (including DoCSoc Committee candidates'!) [over here](https://vote.union.ic.ac.uk/manifestos).
